title: Miscellaneous News: Current Affaires Updates in Hindi with Inshorts
news_articles: पाकिस्तान के लाहौर में कैनाल रोड पर दो शुतुरमुर्ग वाहनों के साथ दौड़ते दिखे जिसका एक वीडियो सोशल मीडिया पर वायरल हो गया है। पाकिस्तानी न्यूज़ चैनल एआरवाई की रिपोर्ट के मुताबिक, एक व्यक्ति ने व्यस्त सड़क पर दौड़ रहे शुतुरमुर्ग को गर्दन से पकड़ने की कोशिश की जिससे उसमें से एक शुतुरमुर्ग की मौत हो गई है।अमेरिका के टेक्सास के एक सरकारी पार्क ने फेसबुक पर एक मछली की तस्वीर शेयर की है जिसमें मछली की जीभ की जगह एक परजीवी (पैरासाइट) दिख रहा है। गैल्वेस्टन आइलैंड स्टेट पार्क ने लिखा है, "इस परजीवी ने मछली की जीभ को उससे अलग कर दिया और उसके बाद मछली के मुंह से जुड़कर उसकी जीभ बन गया।"दुनिया के सबसे ज़हरीले सांपों में से एक माना जाने वाला एक सांप भारत से ब्रिटेन पहुंचे पत्थरों के एक कंटेनर में मिला है। जानवरों के एक अस्पताल के स्टाफ को उसे पकड़ने को बुलाया गया। बकौल अस्पताल, सांप को डब्बे में लॉक कर कमरे में रखा गया है और एक्सपर्ट द्वारा उसे ले जाने का इंतज़ार हो रहा है।गार्ड के फेस मास्क पहनने के लिए कहने के बाद एक चीनी करोड़पति ने अपने खाते से 5 मिलियन युआन (₹5.8 करोड़) निकाल लिए और कर्मचारियों को उसे हाथों से गिनकर देने की मांग की। बकौल करोड़पति, बैंक ऑफ शंघाई की उस ब्रांच के कर्मचारी के खराब व्यवहार के चलते वह अपना सारा पैसा निकालकर अन्य बैंकों में डाल देगा।मध्य प्रदेश के मुख्यमंत्री शिवराज सिंह चौहान ने बेबी कैरियर बैग में बेटी को लेकर ड्यूटी कर रहीं डीएसपी के साथ तस्वीर शेयर कर लिखा है, "अलीराजपुर यात्रा के दौरान देखा कि डीएसपी...डेढ़ वर्षीय बेटी को बेबी कैरियर बैग में लिए ड्यूटी पर तैनात थीं।" बकौल शिवराज, "कर्तव्य के प्रति उनका यह समर्पण अभिनंदनीय है...एमपी को उन पर गर्व है।"आईएएस अफसर अवनीश शरण ने शुक्रवार को ट्विटर पर सीएसके के कप्तान एम.एस. धोनी का छठ संबंधी मीम शेयर कर लिखा, "एक 'बिहारी' ही इस पंक्ति में छुपी 'भावनाओं' को समझ सकता है। ❤️" मीम में धोनी फोन पर बात करते दिख रहे हैं और उस पर लिखा था, "हां मां...छठ में घर आने का टिकट कंफर्म हो गया है।"डोमिनिका के वर्षावन में क्रेन से उठाए गए एक 10-फीट लंबे सांप का वीडियो वायरल हो गया है। इसमें दिख रहा है कि यह सांप धीरे-धीरे अपना सिर ऊपर उठा रहा है। टिकटॉक यूज़र द्वारा शेयर इस वीडियो को करोड़ों व्यूज़ मिल चुके हैं और कई लोगों का अनुमान है कि यह दुनिया का सबसे बड़ा सांप हो सकता है।कर्नाटक में एक केएफसी आउटलेट का एक वीडियो वायरल हुआ है जिसमें ग्राहक के अनुरोध पर एक स्टाफ कन्नड़ गाने बजाने से इनकार करता दिख रहा है। केएफसी प्रवक्ता ने कहा कि यह वीडियो पुराना है। बयान में कहा गया है, "केएफसी इंडिया में...सभी समुदायों का सर्वोच्च सम्मान है...हमारी एक समान प्लेलिस्ट है जो...देशभर के रेस्टोरेंट में बजाई जाती है।"पश्चिम बंगाल में मछुआरों की एक टीम ने सुंदरबन की एक नदी से 75 किलोग्राम की एक तेलिया भोला मछली पकड़ी जिसकी तस्वीरें सोशल मीडिया पर सामने आई हैं। यह मछली कथित तौर पर कोलकाता की एक संस्था केएमपी ने तकरीबन ₹36 लाख में खरीदी। रिपोर्ट्स के अनुसार, तेलिया भोला मछली अपने औषधीय गुणों के कारण बहुत महंगी बिकती है।आईएमएफ की मुख्य अर्थशास्त्री गीता गोपीनाथ ने ट्विटर पर पूर्व आरबीआई गवर्नर रघुराम राजन व नोबेल पुरस्कार विजेता अभिजीत बनर्जी और एस्थर डफलो​​ के साथ प्री-दिवाली सेलिब्रेशन की तस्वीर शेयर की है। कई ट्विटर यूज़र्स ने इस तस्वीर पर प्रतिक्रिया दी है जिसमें से एक ने लिखा है, "आप लोगों ने जो किया है उसके लिए आप सभी का धन्यवाद!🙏#प्राउडदेशी।"एक शख्स को मिंत्रा से फुटबॉल स्टॉकिंग्स ऑर्डर करने पर ब्रा डिलीवर किया गया है। शख्स ने मिंत्रा का उसे लौटाने से इनकार करने का मेसेज शेयर करते हुए ट्वीट किया, "तो मैं फुटबॉल खेलने के लिए 34 सीसी की ब्रा पहनूंगा।" मिंत्रा ने उसके ट्वीट पर जवाब देते हुए लिखा कि वह इस मामले को देख रही है।तुर्की के मेहमत असलान की बिना पैर वाले शख्स और उसके बिना हाथ-पैरों वाले बेटे की तस्वीर ने सिएना इंटरनैशनल फोटो अवॉर्ड्स में 'फोटो ऑफ द ईयर' अवॉर्ड जीता है। मुंज़िर ने सीरिया-युद्ध में पैर गंवाया था जबकि पत्नी के ज़हरीले नर्व-गैस के संपर्क में आने के बाद मेडिकेशन से हुए डिसऑर्डर के चलते मुस्तफा बिना हाथ-पैरों के जन्मा था।मिस्र में एक शख्स ने 6 महीने पहले एक मोबाइल फोन निगल लिया और किसी से मदद नहीं मांगी क्योंकि उसे उम्मीद थी कि वह उसके शरीर से खुद-ब-खुद निकल जाएगा। आखिरकार पेट दर्द बढ़ने पर वह डॉक्टरों के पास पहुंचा और एक्स-रे करने के बाद उसकी इमरजेंसी सर्जरी की गई। ऑपरेशन आसवान यूनिवर्सिटी हॉस्पिटल में किया गया।गुजरात की 70-वर्षीय महिला ने आईवीएफ (इन विट्रो फर्टिलाइज़ेशन) के ज़रिए शादी के 45 साल बाद अपने पहले बच्चे को जन्म दिया है। इसे लेकर डॉक्टर नरेश भानुशाली ने कहा, "दंपति दो साल पहले मेरे पास सलाह लेने आया था...मैं कई वर्षों से प्रैक्टिस कर रहा हूं...लेकिन इस बच्चे के जन्म के बाद मुझे अलग तरह की संतुष्टि मिली है।"चीन में एक महिला के कान के अंदर से डॉक्टर को ज़िंदा मकड़ी मिली जिसकी तस्वीर ऑनलाइन सामने आई है। दरअसल, महिला कान में बेचैनी और अजीब सी आवाज़ की शिकायत को लेकर अस्पताल गई थी जहां डॉक्टर को जांच में मकड़ी का पता चला। हालांकि, डॉक्टर ने इलेक्ट्रिक ओटोस्कोप के ज़रिए मकड़ी को महिला के कान से हटा दिया।बिहार में कोबरा परिवार के एक ज़हरीले सांप धारीदार करैत को बचाए जाने के बाद एक वनकर्मी ने लोगों को स्पीच दी और इसका वीडियो सोशल मीडिया पर काफी शेयर हो रहा है। वीडियो में वनकर्मी ने सांप ना मारने के लिए लोगों का शुक्रिया अदा करते हुए कहा, "ये हमारे पर्यावरण के अंग हैं...इनके बिना...धरती का जीवन अधूरा है।"रूस के हकासिया में हाल ही में सूअर के जैसे शरीर के साथ दो सिर वाले गाय के बछड़े का जन्म हुआ था। हालांकि, यह बछड़ा बच नहीं पाया और उसकी मां की भी कुछ दिन बाद मौत हो गई। पशु चिकित्सा विभाग ने बताया, "आनुवंशिक असामान्यताओं के साथ जानवरों के पैदा होने का मुख्य कारण जीनोम में बदलाव है।"

title: India can consider Ishan Kishan ahead of Pandya: Gavaskar on match vs NZ | T20_World_Cup News | Inshorts
news_articles: Ex-India captain Sunil Gavaskar has said that Team India can consider Ishan Kishan ahead of Hardik Pandya in their match against New Zealand in the T20 World Cup on Sunday. "If Hardik is not bowling...I'll surely consider Ishan...And perhaps, you can think of Shardul Thakur in place of Bhuvneshwar Kumar," he stated. India lost to Pakistan in their WC opener.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: Don't have weight issues: Teejay to trolls calling her tummy out of shape | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Actor Karenvir Bohra's wife Teejay Sidhu addressed comments on the shape of her body after she posted a picture of herself in a swimsuit. Sharing new photos of herself in a monokini, Teejay said, "Some people commented...my tummy wasn't in great shape. But I don't want to post glossy...images so that my body looks more pleasing...I don't have...weight issues."
author: Mahima KharbandaMahima Kharbanda

title: Jason Holder added to West Indies squad in place of injured Obed McCoy | T20_World_Cup News | Inshorts
news_articles: All-rounder Jason Holder has been added to the West Indies squad for the T20 World Cup as a replacement for seamer Obed McCoy, who has been ruled out of the rest of the tournament due to a right shin injury. Holder was already in the UAE as a travelling reserve. West Indies have lost both of their opening two games.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: Women shouldn't take pressure over late pregnancy: Kareena | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Actress Kareena Kapoor Khan has said that women should not take pressure over late pregnancy, adding she first became a mother when she was 36 years old. The actress further said that she had children because she wanted to and not due to a discussion.  "I never planned having a baby because...my biological clock is ticking...or whatever," Kareena said.
author: Kriti KambiriKriti Kambiri

title: India reports 16,156 new COVID cases, 20% higher than yesterday; 733 deaths | Coronavirus News | Inshorts
news_articles: India reported 16,156 COVID-19 cases, 20% higher than yesterday, and 733 deaths in the last 24 hours. Kerala recorded 9,445 cases and 622 deaths on Wednesday. Of the 622 deaths, 93 were reported in the last few days, 330 were those which were not confirmed until June 18 last year and 199 were designated as COVID-19 deaths after receiving appeals.
author: Apaar SharmaApaar Sharma

title: We've played some poor cricket in T20 WC 2021: Ex-Windies captain Lloyd | T20_World_Cup News | Inshorts
news_articles: Ex-West Indies captain Clive Lloyd, who led the team to two World Cup titles, has said the Kieron Pollard-led side has played some poor cricket in the ongoing T20 World Cup 2021. "The first match [against England] was dismal...we [should've] picked ourselves up [against SA] but that too didn't happen...as defending champions, this was a very ordinary performance," he stated.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: Bowling is going to be extremely fast, Aus will defeat SL: Aakash | T20_World_Cup News | Inshorts
news_articles: Commentator Aakash Chopra has predicted Australia to win against Sri Lanka in the T20 World Cup 2021 on Thursday. "The bowling is going to be extremely fast, whether it is Starc, Cummins or Hazlewood. I feel [Sri Lanka's] three or more wickets can fall [during power play]," he added. Both Australia and Sri Lanka have won their opening games.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: 2 red sand boa snakes rescued in Mumbai; 3 men arrested | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: Wildlife protection and forest officials rescued two red sand boa snakes in Mumbai's Goregaon and arrested three people, police said. Following a tip-off, Wildlife Crime Control Bureau (WCCB) and Forest Department officials laid a trap and apprehended the accused who'd come to deliver the reptiles to someone. Reportedly, sand boas are used for making medicines, cosmetics and in black magic.
author: Athira SasidharanAthira Sasidharan

title: Barcelona sack coach Ronald Koeman after 3rd defeat in last 4 league games  | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Barcelona have sacked coach Ronald Koeman following their 1-0 loss to Rayo Vallecano, their third defeat in their last four La Liga games. Barcelona, who're currently at ninth position in the Spanish league standings, had earlier lost to Real Madrid in the El Clasico on Sunday. According to reports, the role has now been offered to club's ex-player Xavi Hernandez.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: Why can't we just say 'Well done Pak' & leave it at that: Gambhir on Shami getting abused | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Ex-India opener Gautam Gambhir has come out in support of Mohammad Shami, who was trolled and abused after Pakistan defeated India in T20 World Cup 2021. "Why can't we just say, 'Well done Pakistan' and leave it at that?" Gambhir said. He added, "Shami's integrity towards his team and country was being questioned. How ridiculous can that be?"
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Maharashtra Home Minister Dilip Walse Patil tests positive for COVID-19 | Coronavirus News | Inshorts
news_articles: Maharashtra Home Minister Dilip Walse Patil on Thursday said that he has tested positive for COVID-19 with mild symptoms. "My condition is stable and I am following my doctor's advice," he tweeted. "I urge all those who came in contact with me during Nagpur and Amravati tour, and other programs, to get themselves tested," Patil further said.
author: Atul MishraAtul Mishra

title: Sourav Ganguly quits ATK Mohun Bagan position after their owners RPSG buy IPL team | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: BCCI President Sourav Ganguly has confirmed to Cricbuzz that he has resigned as director of Indian Super League (ISL) team ATK Mohun Bagan. This comes after RPSG Group, that owns ATK Mohun Bagan, became the owners of Lucknow IPL franchise. Ganguly took the decision to avoid potential conflict of interest.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Those who said it's impossible to do it, they're all watching: Ramiz Raja | T20_World_Cup News | Inshorts
news_articles: With Pakistan defeating India and New Zealand in the ongoing T20 World Cup, Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Chairman Ramiz Raja took to Twitter to share an image to criticise those who doubted the team. "They're all watching. The ones who said it is impossible to do it. The ones who want to watch you fail doing it," it said.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: Isha Ambani joins Smithsonian's National Museum of Asian Art's board | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: Reliance Jio Director Isha Ambani has joined the Smithsonian's National Museum of Asian Art's board of trustees for a four-year term effective September 23, 2021. "Ambani has a deep love for Indian art and a passion to bring that art to new audiences," the museum in Washington, DC, said. US VP Kamala Harris is also on the museum's 17-member board.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Man City's bid for 5th straight League Cup ends as West Ham win 5-3 via penalties | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: West Ham United ended Manchester City's four-year reign as English League Cup title holders after their 5-3 penalty-shootout victory in the fourth round of the competition on late Wednesday night. "Nothing is eternal...We fought a lot to win and win this competition. Today it's finished, and next season we'll be back to win it again," said City manager Pep Guardiola.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: Dravid as coach will bring blueprint for Team India for next 5 yrs: Aakash  | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Commentator Aakash Chopra has said that if Rahul Dravid becomes Team India's head coach, then the ex-India captain will "bring a blueprint for Indian cricket for the next five or ten years". Aakash added, "We can see the pair of Dravid and Rohit Sharma for white-ball cricket and Dravid with Virat Kohli for Test matches. It's going to be interesting."
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: It's too easy for them right now: Atherton as England defeat B'desh  | T20_World_Cup News | Inshorts
news_articles: Ex-England opener Michael Atherton said it's "too easy" for England "right now" after the Eoin Morgan-led side defeated Bangladesh to consolidate their place at the top of the Group 1 table. "They've breezed past West Indies and Bangladesh, and now their net run-rate is absolutely fantastic...they have points in bag. They look [like] one of the form teams," he added.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: It is not Diwali that'll come annually: Aakash on ICC playing Associate teams in WCs | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Cricketer-turned-commentator Aakash Chopra has said that ICC is just doing "tokenism" by including Associate teams in World Cups. "It is like giving a lollipop to a kid...If you genuinely want to bring Associate nations forward then don't remember them only World Cup to World Cup, it's not Diwali that'll come annually. You will have to play them consistently," he added.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: 2 painters left hanging above 26th floor of building after woman cuts rope in Thailand | World News | Inshorts
news_articles: A resident of a high-rise condominium in Thailand cut the support rope for two painters, apparently angry she wasn't told they'd be doing work, and left them hanging above 26th floor until a couple rescued them, police said. She's facing attempted murder and property destruction charges. She could face up to 20 years' prison if found guilty of attempted murder.
author: Daisy MowkeDaisy Mowke

title: Dinesh Karthik, Dipika Pallikal blessed with twin boys, share pics | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Cricketer Dinesh Karthik and his wife, squash player Dipika Pallikal, have been blessed with twin boys. Sharing pictures on Instagram, Karthik wrote, "Dipika and I have been blessed with two beautiful baby boys...Kabir Pallikal Karthik and Zian Pallikal Karthik, and we could not be happier." Karthik and Dipika got married in 2015.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Who are the five oldest players featuring in T20 World Cup 2021? | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: West Indies' Chris Gayle, aged over 42, is the oldest cricketer featuring in the ongoing T20 World Cup 2021. Gayle is followed by Pakistan all-rounders, 41-year-old Mohammad Hafeez and 39-year-old Shoaib Malik. West Indies' Dwayne Bravo is the fourth-oldest player in the tournament at the age of 38. He is followed by Namibia's Craig Williams, who's 37 years old.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Does this illiterate journalist open her mouth to just s**t: Harbhajan on Pak reporter | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: After Pakistani journalist Iqra Nasir shared a video of Harbhajan Singh getting hit for sixes by Shahid Afridi, he shared a video of him hitting a six and wrote, "For your reference...illiterate journalist." Iqra then shared a video of Younis Khan hitting a six against Harbhajan, to which he replied, "Does this illiterate journalist open her mouth to just s**t?"
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Harbhajan shares video after Twitter spat with Amir, says 'Just get out of my life' | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Veteran off-spinner Harbhajan Singh has shared a video on YouTube to address his Twitter spat with Pakistani fast bowler Mohammad Amir following Pakistan's win against India. "He is a disgrace. He has put a black spot on world cricket. No one will forget it," he said. "I shouldn't have reacted to your tweets...just get out of my life," he added.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Indian govt starts probe against Facebook, seeks info about its algorithm: Report | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: The Indian government has reportedly started a probe against Facebook and sought information about the algorithm it uses for content moderation and how it's preventing online harm.The government was "alarmed" by revelations made in leaked internal documents about 'India experiment', where a test account was filled with gory images and fake news within 21 days, the report said.
author: Kiran KhatriKiran Khatri

title: Woman files 7 rape cases in Gurugram in a year, 2 found fake; women panel seeks probe | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: Haryana State Commission for Women has asked the state police to probe allegations of 'fake' rape cases registered by a woman. According to a complaint, the woman has filed as many as seven rape cases against seven different men at different police stations in Gurugram within a year. Two of the seven cases have reportedly been found false.
author: Apaar SharmaApaar Sharma

news_articles: Bombay High Court on Thursday disposed of NCB Zonal Director Sameer Wankhede's plea seeking interim protection from arrest over the enquiry against him by Maharashtra government. Wankhede had stated he has "apprehensions that Mumbai Police may arrest him". The court disposed the plea after the state government's lawyer assured that three-day notice will be given before arrest by Mumbai Police.
author: Arshiya ChopraArshiya Chopra

title: It's brilliant that Haris is listening to his teammates before bowling: Hogg | T20_World_Cup News | Inshorts
news_articles: Ex-Australia spinner Brad Hogg has praised Pakistan pacer Haris Rauf for his performance in the ongoing T20 World Cup 2021. "Haris knows he hasn't got much experience...at the international level. So, he's listening to his teammates...like Babar Azam for one, Malik and Hafeez...I thought that was brilliant," Hogg added. Haris was named 'Man of the Match' against New Zealand.
author: Ankur TaliyanAnkur Taliyan

title: Namibia beat Scotland in T20 WC 2021 as Ruben takes 3 wickets in 1st over of match | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Namibia defeated Scotland by four wickets in their first T20 World Cup Super 12 stage Group 2 match on Wednesday. The match witnessed Namibia's Ruben Trumpelmann taking three wickets in the first over of Scotland's innings. Namibia chased down the 110-run target on the first ball of the 20th over with a six from JJ Smit.

title: 8 people killed, several injured after mini bus falls into gorge in J&K's Doda | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: Eight people died while several others suffered injuries after a mini bus travelling from Thathri to Doda, J&K fell into a gorge on Thursday, Additional SP, Doda said. author: Sakshi SharmaSakshi Sharma

title: 23-year-old man killed after PMPML bus hits motorcycle in Pune | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: A 23-year-old man was killed after a Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahamandal Limited (PMPML) bus hit a motorcycle in Lohegaon. The deceased was returning home on his motorcycle when a PMPML bus coming from the opposite side hit his vehicle. The incident took place on October 24 and the impact was so severe that the man died, police said.

news_articles: Filmmaker Karan Johar is all praises for Tollywood superstar Allu Arjun after he sent best wishes and congratulated the 'Sooryavanshi' team at Varudu Kaavalenu's promotional event. She was seen wearing a 'chair hat', a hat with a chair mounted on it, which the rapper later used for sitting. title: TCS' attrition rate of 8.6% lowest among major Indian IT firms: Report | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: IT major Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) recently said its attrition rate stood at 8.63% in the past year. The company's attrition rate rose from 7.2% in the quarter ended March 31 but is reportedly the lowest among other major Indian IT firms. Wipro and Infosys' attrition rates in the same period were 12.1% and 15.2% respectively.
author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

title: US man puts 6 kidney beans in his private parts as a 'sex experiment'  | Hatke News | Inshorts
news_articles: A US man inserted six kidney beans in his private parts as a "sex experiment" but was hospitalised when he couldn't "express the beans during ejaculation" as planned. He told doctors he had tried the sex act before but never used this many beans. The beans measured 15 millimetres by 7 millimetres and were removed from his urethra and bladder.
author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

title: 25-ft rubber duck with 'Joy' written on it appears in US harbour | Hatke News | Inshorts
news_articles: A 25-foot rubber duck with the word "Joy" written on it mysteriously appeared in a harbour in Maine, US over the weekend. An official at the Belfast Harbour reportedly said it doesn't pose a navigational hazard and "everyone loves it". She added that she has no idea who owns it but "a lot of people" want to keep it there.
author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

title: Danish artist keeps museum's ₹62 lakh, says 'My artwork is I took their money' | Hatke News | Inshorts
news_articles: Danish artist Jens Haaning has pocketed 534,000 kroner (around ₹62 lakh) he received from a Denmark museum to incorporate into an artwork. When the museum received the promised artwork, the cash was missing from glass frames and the title had been changed to: "Take the Money And Run". "The work of art is that I took their money," Haaning said.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Taliban stopped 72 Afghan Hindus, Sikhs from boarding IAF plane in Kabul: Report | World News | Inshorts
news_articles: Taliban stopped around 72 Afghan Hindus and Sikhs, including two members of Afghanistan Parliament, from boarding the Indian Air Force plane at Kabul airport, the Indian Express reported. "Taliban fighters...said that since they are Afghans, they must go back (from the airport)," said President of World Punjabi Organisation (WPO). India had earlier said it'll help evacuate Afghan Hindus and Sikhs.
author: Sakshita KhoslaSakshita Khosla

title: Tahira announces her debut feature film starring Divya, Saiyami  | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Filmmaker-writer Tahira Kashyap Khurrana took to social media to announce her debut feature film, titled 'Sharmaji Ki Beti'. The film, "a heart-warming, slice-of-life comedy-drama about the modern Indian female experience", will feature Divya Dutta, Sakshi Tanwar and Saiyami Kher. Sharing the news, Tahira wrote, "Feeling so numb! Can't believe it's finally happening. I feel only gratitude."
author: Udit GuptaUdit Gupta

title: Senegal man dresses as woman to take girlfriend's exam; caught | Hatke News | Inshorts
news_articles: A man in Senegal dressed as a woman to take his girlfriend's high school graduation exams because he feared she would not clear them. While he got away with it for three days, an invigilator noticed something strange about his appearance on the fourth day and handed him over to the police. He reportedly wore make-up, a headscarf and earrings.
author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

news_articles: A Texas-based man recently won a $5.5 million (₹40.8 crore) lawsuit against a bar after getting into a drunken fight in the bar's parking lot in 2019. The lawsuit claimed the restaurant and bartender were negligent in their actions and allowed him to get "too drunk", leading to a fight. The man has previously been arrested for public intoxication.
author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

title: US policeman jumps on to subway tracks to rescue man as train approaches | Hatke News | Inshorts
news_articles: The video of a New York City Police Department (NYPD) officer jumping on to subway tracks to rescue an unconscious man as the train approaches was recently posted on Instagram. The cop was helped by a "good samaritan" and the duo were able to save the man who had fallen face-first on the tracks. The man reportedly had a seizure.
author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

title: China plans to break up Alipay, create separate loans app: Report | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: Beijing is planning to break up Ant Group's Alipay and create a separate app for the company's loans business, Financial Times reported. The plan will reportedly require Ant to turn over user data underpinning loan decisions to a new credit scoring joint venture that will be partly state-owned. Ant's affiliate Alibaba's Hong Kong-listed shares fell over 4% after the report.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: Latest rankings for Test bowlers out, Mohammed Siraj jumps 18 spots | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: The ICC today released the latest rankings for Test bowlers, with India fast bowler Mohammed Siraj, who took eight wickets in the Lord's Test, jumping 18 spots to be ranked 38th. Meanwhile, fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah has dropped one place to be ranked 10th. England's James Anderson is now ranked sixth after jumping one spot.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

news_articles: A Massachusetts woman who was wrongly convicted of witchcraft in 1693 and sentenced to death will likely be pardoned 328 years later, because of a group of eighth-graders. author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

news_articles: America's famous 'Skinny House' in Boston, that's about 10 feet wide at its widest point and narrows in the back to about 9.25 feet, has been sold for $1.25 million (over ₹9.21 crore). The four-storey house built in 1862 is about 1,165 square feet (108 square metres). It has two bedrooms and one bathroom and includes a private deck.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

His comments came amid the Taliban taking over Afghanistan. "It's necessary that we not only create strong...well-equipped forces, but also develop our defence industry which is equally strong," he said.

Maharashtra CMO said amusement parks can reopen from October 22 but water rides will not be allowed to operate yet. author: Sakshita KhoslaSakshita Khosla

"We're...taking possible steps like doing blending of 10% which we are going to raise to 20%," he added. Adie Timmermans has been visiting the 38-year-old chimpanzee, Chita, for four years and the two used to blow kisses and wave at each other. author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

The snake catcher said the python was "mellow" and "almost...asking" to be taken outside.
author: Maanya SachdevaMaanya Sachdeva

title: World's largest plant to capture CO2 from air starts in Iceland | Science News | Inshorts
news_articles: The world's largest plant that captures carbon dioxide directly from the air and deposits it underground will begin operations on Wednesday. Swiss startup Climeworks AG has partnered with Icelandic carbon storage firm Carbfix to develop a plant that sucks out up to 4,000 tonnes of CO2 per year. That's the equivalent of the annual emissions from about 790 cars.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: South Delhi Municipal Corporation bans cross-gender massages at spas | National News | Inshorts

"Male and female centres will be in different sections...can remain open only between 9 am and 9 pm," SDMC stated. "In residential areas, new centres will not be allowed," it added. SDMC also made the production of ID cards of all customers mandatory.

author: Mahima KharbandaMahima Kharbanda

author: Kriti KambiriKriti Kambiri

title: 1,00,000 Tesla cars sold to Hertz at same price as to consumers: Musk | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: After US car rental company Hertz's order for 1,00,000 Tesla cars led to a surge in Tesla's stock price, CEO Elon Musk said, "To be clear, cars sold to Hertz have no discount. Same price as to consumers." Tesla's market capitalisation also surpassed $1 trillion. "Strange that moved valuation, as Tesla is very much a production ramp problem," Musk noted.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: Woman arrested in Kolkata double murder case, her son still missing | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: A 42-year-old woman has been arrested in connection with the killings of Kilburn Engineering Managing Director Subir Chaki and his driver in Kolkata on Sunday. Police are looking for her elder son and a few others. The bodies of the victims were found with injuries on their neck, legs and back on different floors of Chaki's ancestral house in Gariahat.
author: Deepika BhattDeepika Bhatt

title: 7-day-old baby kidnapped from Guj, sold to Bihar army man at ₹4 lakh | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: A seven-day-old boy who was allegedly kidnapped from Gujarat's Vadodara six days ago was found in Bihar, where he was sold to an army jawan for ₹4 lakh. Two people had kidnapped the baby from a hut. A team has been sent to Bihar to bring back the baby, police said, adding that the army jawan will be arrested.
author: Deepika BhattDeepika Bhatt

title: Maruti Suzuki to launch EVs only after 2025: Chairman RC Bhargava | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Maruti Suzuki India Chairman RC Bhargava said the company will launch electric vehicles (EVs) in the country only after 2025 as demand for such vehicles is less at the moment. Maruti would like to sell around 10,000 units a month whenever it enters the electric mobility space, he added. Bhargava said it's difficult to predict pricing of EVs at present.
author: Krishna RajKrishna Raj

title: Self-driving taxis on roads are 10 yrs away: EV startup Lucid CEO | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Electric car startup Lucid Group's CEO Peter Rawlinson said that it will likely take a decade before self-driving taxis or robotaxis are deployed on roads. "I think we're 10 years out before we see fleets of robotaxis...There is a mountain to climb - an intellectual mountain to climb in terms of software," Rawlinson, a former chief engineer at Tesla, added.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: Tesla Model 3 becomes first EV to top European monthly sales | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Tesla's Model 3 has become the first electric car to top monthly sales of new cars in Europe, outselling rival models with gasoline engines. World's richest person Elon Musk-led electric carmaker sold 24,600 Tesla Model 3 cars in September, recording year-on-year growth of 58%, research group JATO Dynamics said. Renault's Clio ranked second with 18,264 units, followed by Dacia's Sandero.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: Chinese incursions into Taiwanese air zone could spark conflict: UK | World News | Inshorts
news_articles: UK Defence Secretary Ben Wallace on Thursday said that Chinese incursions into the Taiwanese air defence zone were dangerous and could spark conflict. He said, "You're in danger of destabilising the region, you're in danger of provoking further conflict in other disputed areas." "The difference between mainland China and Taiwan needs to be resolved through peaceful methods," Wallace added.
author: Dharini MudgalDharini Mudgal

title: XPeng unveils plan for under ₹1.17 cr flying car that can also be driven on road | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Chinese electric vehicle maker XPeng presented plans for a flying car that can also be driven on the road. The car, that XPeng aims to price lower than RMB 1 million (₹1.17 crore), converts to a flying car through a foldable rotor mechanism. It will have a steering wheel for road operations and a single lever for flight modes.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: 2 women killed, 4 others injured in accident on Pune's Navale Bridge | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: Two women died and four persons were injured after a pickup tempo was hit by a container truck near Pune's Navale Bridge on the Mumbai-Bengaluru highway, as per reports. After being hit, the driver of the tempo reportedly lost control of the vehicle and allegedly hit three two-wheeler vehicles. The accident reportedly resulted in a traffic jam on the highway.
author: Shreyasi BanerjeeShreyasi Banerjee

title: Raut shares video of Aryan in custody, shows him talking to private detective Gosavi | Politics News | Inshorts
news_articles: Shiv Sena MP Sanjay Raut on Sunday shared a video of Aryan Khan sitting with private detective and witness KP Gosavi in an office after he was taken into custody. The duo can be seen speaking over the phone. With the video, Raut tweeted, "Witness in #AryanKhan case made to sign on blank paper by NCB is shocking."
author: Arshiya ChopraArshiya Chopra

title: $4.2 billion cars deal generates $119 billion in market value for Tesla, Hertz | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: The news of American car rental company Hertz placing an order for 1,00,000 Tesla cars generated $119 billion jump in market value for the buyer and seller combined. Tesla added $118 billion, taking its total market value to over $1 trillion, while Hertz gained $1.17 billion in market value. Hertz will spend $4.2 billion on the cars, Bloomberg reported.
author: Kiran KhatriKiran Khatri

title: Govt to pitch to Tesla, Samsung for local battery production: Report | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: The government is planning to pitch to companies such as Tesla, Samsung and LG Energy to encourage them to invest in manufacturing batteries locally, Reuters reported quoting government sources. India will reportedly host five roadshows starting next month in several countries to convince battery makers to set up local production. It includes countries like US, Germany, France, South Korea, Japan.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: Cinematographer shared video from location before being accidentally shot dead by Baldwin | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Hours before being accidentally shot dead by actor Alec Baldwin on sets of 'Rust', cinematographer Halyna Hutchins had shared a video from location in Santa Fe where the film was being shot. In the video, she was seen riding a horse. The caption read, "One of the perks of shooting a western is you get to ride horses on...day off."
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Elon Musk's net worth crosses $250 billion as Tesla shares hit record highs | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: World's richest person Elon Musk's net worth crossed $250 billion as shares of Tesla hit fresh all-time highs on Friday. The electric car maker's stock closed at around $910 per share, taking its market value to more than $900 billion for the first time ever. Musk reportedly has a stake of more than 20% in Tesla.
author: Kiran KhatriKiran Khatri

title: Mumbai Mayor shares pic wearing boxing gloves, quotes Muhammad Ali | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: Mumbai Mayor Kishori Pednekar on Saturday shared a picture wearing boxing gloves and quoted legendary boxer Muhammad Ali. "Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee," Pednekar quoted the picture. Replying to the tweet, a user shared a picture of a Mumbai road. "With roads like these, Mumbaikars only have an option to float like a butterfly," the user wrote.
author: Shalini OjhaShalini Ojha

title: 20-yr-old man rapes 6-yr-old girl in Delhi, arrested after being seen on CCTV | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: A 20-year-old man has been arrested from Haryana for allegedly raping a six-year-old girl in Delhi’s Ranjit Nagar on Friday. The arrest took place after CCTV footage from the area showed the girl following him. As per the police, the accused didn’t know the girl or her family and had earlier been arrested for allegedly molesting a minor.
author: Ridham GambhirRidham Gambhir

title: Tesla to use iron-based batteries in its standard-range vehicles | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Tesla has said it will use cheaper lithium-iron-phosphate batteries in its standard-range vehicles across global markets. The firm has been using LFP batteries in China supplied by Contemporary Amperex Technology. Tesla CFO Zach Kirkhorn confirmed during an investor call on Wednesday that the company has seen pricing impacts to nickel and aluminium.
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: World's first postage stamp to be auctioned, expected to fetch up to ₹62 cr | Miscellaneous News | Inshorts
news_articles: An example of the world's first postage stamp, the Penny Black, is being offered at auction with a price estimate of up to $8.25 million (almost ₹62 crore). Dating from 1840, the item is "the earliest securely dated example of the first postage stamp," according to auction house Sotheby's. The adhesive stamp features a profile of Queen Victoria.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Elon Musk tweets 'Wild $T1mes' after Tesla hits $1 trillion market cap | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Tesla CEO and the world's richest person Elon Musk tweeted "Wild $T1mes" after his electric carmaking company hit $1 trillion in market capitalisation for the first time. On Monday, Tesla shares surged 14.9% to $1,045.02 after American car rental company Hertz ordered 1,00,000 Tesla cars. Musk got $36 billion richer in a day and his wealth surged to $289 billion.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Tesla increases price of Model X, Model S variants by $5,000 in US | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Tesla has increased the price of its Model X Long Range and Model S Long Range variants by $5,000 in US. The Model X Long Range and Model S Long Range now sell for $104,990 and $94,990 respectively. The electric car maker also increased the price of its Model Y Long Range and Model 3 Standard Range Plus by $2,000.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: Tesla will get all tax benefits it wants: Niti Aayog Vice Chairman | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Niti Aayog Vice Chairman Rajiv Kumar urged Elon Musk-led Tesla to "come and manufacture" in India. "You (Tesla) will get all the tax benefits you want. The argument that we'll create a market by exporting into India finished products...is an old argument," he added. Earlier, reports said Tesla urged PM Narendra Modi's office to slash import taxes on electric vehicles.
author: Kiran KhatriKiran Khatri

title: Apple's talks with Chinese battery makers mostly stalled: Report | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Apple's talks with China's CATL and BYD over battery supplies for its planned electric vehicle have been mostly stalled, Reuters reported. The companies have reportedly refused to set up teams and build US plants that will solely cater to Apple. The iPhone maker is now said to be considering Japanese battery makers, including Panasonic.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: Mahindra to sell SsangYong for $260 mn to S Korean startup: Report | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Mahindra & Mahindra's South Korean subsidiary SsangYong Motor Company has reportedly named a consortium led by South Korean electric vehicle startup Edison Motors as its preferred bidder. The deal is estimated to be worth about $260 million, Nikkei reported. SsangYong, which was put under court receivership earlier this year, was acquired by Mahindra & Mahindra for $463 million in 2011.
author: Hiral GoyalHiral Goyal

title: List of all the bidders and their amounts for 2 new IPL teams surfaces | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: List of all the bidders and their amounts for two new IPL teams has surfaced. The list shows RPSG Ventures Limited bid ₹7,090 crore for both Ahmedabad and Lucknow teams and went for Lucknow. Adani Group bid ₹5,100 crore for Ahmedabad but were beaten by CVC Capital, who bid ₹5,625 crore. RPSG also bid for Indore for ₹4,790 crore.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Ola announces plans to hire 10,000 new people, looks to ramp up Ola Cars | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Ola on Thursday announced its plans to hire 10,000 new people across its sales and service centres. Ola is eyeing a $2 billion Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) for its vehicle commerce platform Ola Cars over the next 12 months. Ola's newly-formed Ola Cars vertical allows consumers to purchase new as well as pre-owned vehicles through the Ola app.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: What multiple records were broken in Afghanistan's biggest-ever T20I win vs Scotland? | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Afghanistan recorded their biggest-ever win in T20Is after beating Scotland by 130 runs in T20 World Cup 2021. Scotland's 60-all out is their lowest T20I total. Mujeeb Ur Rahman (5/20) became the first Afghanistan player to take a five-wicket haul in T20 World Cup. He also became the first player to claim a five-wicket haul on debut in T20 WC.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Even I've lost against Pak but was never told to go to Pak: Irfan on Shami getting abused | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Irfan Pathan took to Twitter to lend support to Mohammad Shami, who was abused online following India's defeat against Pakistan in T20 World Cup. He wrote, "Even I was part of #IndvsPak battles on field where we've lost but never been told to go to Pakistan! I'm talking about India of few years back. This crap needs to stop."
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: Jaguar Land Rover extends production cuts amid chip shortage: Report | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: Tata Motors-owned Jaguar Land Rover has decided to extend production cuts in the current quarter amid the global semiconductor chip shortage, The Economic Times reported. It has scheduled production shutdown at its Nitra and Solihull plants, while the plant in Graz will also witness no-production days, it added. This may result in an incremental revenue loss of about ₹3,100-3,350 crore.
author: Krishna RajKrishna Raj

title: Musk asked to change Tesla Autopilot design for safety by US govt | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: US government agency NTSB has written to Tesla CEO Elon Musk asking to change the design of Tesla's advanced driver assistance system to ensure safety and stop misuse by drivers. The agency also expressed concern that Tesla is yet to implement its safety recommendations issued over four years ago. The NTSB can make recommendations but has no enforcement authority.
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: Afghanistan captain Nabi breaks down during National Anthem, pics surface | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: Afghanistan captain Mohammad Nabi broke down when his country's National Anthem played ahead of their T20 World Cup 2021 Super 12 stage Group 2 match against Scotland. "This is what cricket is. No matter what they've gone through...It gives people hope," a fan commented. Afghanistan went on to win the match by 130 runs.
author: Anmol SharmaAnmol Sharma

title: 17-yr-old girl raped by man who promised to marry her in Hyderabad | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: A 17-year-old girl was allegedly raped by an autorickshaw driver in Hyderabad's Banjara Hills, police said on Thursday. The 23-year-old accused was known to the girl as they live in the same locality. The man befriended the girl nearly a year ago and he had also promised to marry her, the police said.
author: Deepika BhattDeepika Bhatt

title: Govt unveils draft rules for safety of kids below 4 yrs carried on motorcycles | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: The Ministry of Road Transport and Highways unveiled draft rules for the safety of children below four years carried on a motorcycle. The rules include attaching the child to the driver with a safety harness and usage of a crash helmet by kids aged between nine months and four years. They also recommend limiting the vehicle's speed to 40 kmph.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Samantha cites Shilpa's case in YouTubers defamation case: Report | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Actress Samantha Ruth Prabhu has cited the permanent injunction order filed by Shilpa Shetty in her defamation case against YouTubers, as per reports. A Hyderabad court had earlier said that celebrities share personal details and then file defamation cases and directed Samantha to seek an apology instead. Samantha's legal team reportedly approached the court for a verdict similar to Shilpa's.
author: Kriti KambiriKriti Kambiri

title: '83' is Kabir Khan's labour of love for Indian team: Tahir | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Actor Tahir Raj Bhasin has said his upcoming film, '83', is director Kabir Khan's labour of love and passion for the Indian cricket team. "It's a film about how underdog India went on to become world champions," he added. The film, based on India's win in the 1983 Cricket World Cup, will arrive in theatres on Christmas this year.
author: Udit GuptaUdit Gupta

title: Huawei paid Democratic lobbyist Podesta $1 mn to lobby US govt: Report | Technology News | Inshorts
news_articles: Chinese telecommunications firm Huawei paid Democratic lobbyist Tony Podesta $1 million to lobby the Biden administration on its behalf in the third quarter, Reuters reported. The Washington lobbyist had disclosed a $500,000 payment from Huawei in a third-quarter lobbying report. The additional undisclosed $500,000 payment will reportedly be included in Podesta's fourth-quarter filing in January.
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: Cyberattack at gas stations was meant to create disorder: Iran Prez | World News | Inshorts
news_articles: Iran's President Ebrahim Raisi has said the cyberattack, which disrupted the sale of heavily subsidised gasoline in Iran on Tuesday, was designed to get "people angry by creating disorder". Around 4,300 gas stations in Iran were reportedly disabled by the cyberattack. Raisi said, "There should be serious readiness in...cyberwar & related bodies should not allow...enemy to follow....ominous aims."
author: Dharini MudgalDharini Mudgal

title: Instagram allows all users to share links in Stories via stickers | Technology News | Inshorts
news_articles: Instagram has announced that all users will now have access to its link sticker feature in Stories. The feature allows users to add a link to their Instagram story via a sticker, which then redirects viewers once they tap on it. The feature was earlier limited to verified accounts or those with a certain number of followers.
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: My favourite B'wood actors are Big B, Shah Rukh & Aamir Khan: Kumail | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Actor-comedian Kumail Nanjiani said that he has been a big fan of Bollywood. "My favourite stars have been Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, Shammi Kapoor [and Amitabh Bachchan]. I have seen many pictures of all these [actors]," he added. "I grew up watching Bollywood and [I] am a massive fan of Bollywood films," Kumail said.
author: Mahima KharbandaMahima Kharbanda

title: Sequel to Shahid's debut film 'Ishq Vishk' in the works: Reports | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: A sequel to the 2003 film 'Ishq Vishk', which marked the Bollywood debut of Shahid Kapoor, is reportedly in the works. "Producer Ramesh Taurani is extremely excited about Ishq Vishk, and his writers have already begun work on...script," reports stated. Taurani will start looking for a director and the actors as soon as the final script is locked, reports said.
author: Udit GuptaUdit Gupta

title: Centre extends COVID-19 restrictions across country till November 30 | Coronavirus News | Inshorts
news_articles: The Centre has extended COVID-19 restrictions across the country till November 30. In its earlier order, the government said no mass gatherings should be allowed in containment zones and in districts reporting more than 5% case positivity. The government also asked states to follow five pillars of COVID-19 management i.e. "Test-Track-Treat-Vaccinate and adherence to COVID appropriate behaviour".
author: Apaar SharmaApaar Sharma

title: No bail for Aryan Khan yet as Bombay HC adjourns hearing again till tomorrow | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: The Bombay High Court will continue hearing bail pleas of Aryan Khan, Arbaaz Merchantt and Munmun Dhamecha tomorrow. The NCB will respond to the applicants' arguments tomorrow. The ASG said he will try to complete arguments within one hour. "Hearing has been scheduled for 3 pm tomorrow for further arguments," Dhamecha's lawyer stated.
author: Daisy MowkeDaisy Mowke

title: Microsoft nearly overtakes Apple as world's most valuable company | Technology News | Inshorts
news_articles: Microsoft nearly overtook Apple as the world's most valuable firm on October 27 after a surge in its shares. Microsoft's shares jumped 4.2% to end at a record $323.17 after it reported a net income of $20.5 billion in the September-quarter. Its market capitalisation surged to $2.426 trillion, just short of Apple's $2.461 trillion valuation, Refinitiv data showed.
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: Australia recommends making Google offer alternative search engines | Technology News | Inshorts
news_articles: Australian regulator ACCC has recommended making Google install a "choice screen" on smartphones using its Android operating system, to let users pick another search engine. It also wants to limit Google's ability to pay Apple to have its search engine as the default option on iOS devices. Google has a 94% share of the search market in Australia, ACCC said.
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: Firefighter dies after portion of building collapses on him in Delhi | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: A 31-year-old firefighter, who got injured after a portion of a building collapsed on him, died on Wednesday. The firefighter, who was posted in the Outer district of Delhi Fire Services, was trying to control a fire in Narela's Bhorgarh area when the incident took place on October 9. Doctors told us he suffered heart failure, an official said.
author: Atul MishraAtul Mishra

title: 3 Kashmiri students arrested in Agra for sending anti-India texts after Pak's win | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: Three Kashmiri youths, studying at an Agra engineering college under the PM's Special Scholarship Scheme for J&K students, have been arrested for allegedly sharing anti-India messages after Pakistan's win over India at a T20 World Cup match. The students were rusticated from college on Monday. A case was lodged against them on Tuesday after protests were held outside the college.
author: Arshiya ChopraArshiya Chopra

title: Apple faces antitrust case over App Store payment limits in Russia | Technology News | Inshorts
news_articles: Apple is facing antitrust case in Russia for failing to allow app developers to tell customers about alternative payment options when using App Store. It could face a fine based on its revenue if found guilty of breach. Apple was earlier issued with a warning over the issue and given a September 30 deadline to "stop abuse on the market".
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: Always been there: Pak PM Imran Khan thanks Saudi Arabia for $3bn aid | World News | Inshorts
news_articles: Pakistan Prime Minister Imran Khan on Wednesday thanked Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman for $3 billion in financial aid to cash-strapped Pakistan. Khan said that Saudi Arabia "has always been there for Pakistan during its difficult times". The Pakistan government reportedly requires gross external financing of $51.6 billion within a two-year period (2021-2023) to fulfil its needs.
author: Dharini MudgalDharini Mudgal

title: Wow, 13 years ago: Musk on old video from when Tesla was nearly out of cash | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: Tesla CEO and the world's richest person Elon Musk tweeted, "Wow, 13 years ago," in response to his old video taken at the time when Tesla was nearly out of cash. In the video, Musk claimed that he earned "minimum wage" from Tesla. On Monday, Tesla achieved $1 trillion market capitalisation, making Musk $36 billion richer in a day.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai forgets to unmute himself on video call; shares video | Technology News | Inshorts
news_articles: Google CEO Sundar Pichai posted a video on Twitter showing him forgetting to unmute himself on a video call. Pichai was talking to Muppet character Kermit the Frog when he said, "Can't believe I'm talking to Google's CEO and he's on mute." Pichai unmuted himself and said, "I was on mute...I've done it a few times this year...like everyone else."
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Made peace with the fact Zerodha might not even exist after 5 yrs: CEO on competition | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: Zerodha's CEO Nithin Kamath at YourStory's event TechSparks said, "I've made peace with the worst-case out...Five years down the line, Zerodha may not even exist because competition destroys us." He added, "It's been good times for us...but there are competitors who will catch up with us." He also advised founders to build sustainable and resilient businesses instead of chasing valuations.
author: Pragya SwastikPragya Swastik

title: Getting due for your work is exciting: Satish on his 1st National Award | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Satish Kaushik, whose 'Chhoriyan Chhoron Se Kam Nahi Hoti' won Best Feature Film in Haryanvi at 67th National Film Awards, said, "Getting due for your hard work...is exciting." "This is...my first National award, I'm very happy....it's in the language that's mine," he added. Satish further said the award has boosted his morale to make more films in the Haryanvi language.
author: Udit GuptaUdit Gupta

title: Facebook hires Britney's lawyer to fight upcoming TV show: Report | Technology News | Inshorts
news_articles: Facebook has hired Mathew Rosengart, the lawyer who fought against Britney Spears' conservatorship, to fight upcoming TV series 'Doomsday Machine', Deadline reported. The series is an adaption of An Ugly Truth, a book on Facebook's steps on issues like misinformation, hate speech and user security. Facebook has threatened legal action if any false statements about it appear in the show.
author: Aishwarya AwasthiAishwarya Awasthi

title: Sick and tired of Baburao image, want to get rid of it: Paresh Rawal | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Actor Paresh Rawal said that he wants to get rid of the image of 'Baburao Apte' because things got dirty with 'Hera Pheri 2'. When told that the 'Hera Pheri' dialogues go viral very quickly, Paresh said, "But I'm...sick and tired of that." "In 'Hera Pheri 2', we were....over smart...And it didn't work...It all got too dirty," he added.
author: Mahima KharbandaMahima Kharbanda

title: महिंद्रा और ओला सीईओ ने ऑटो क्षेत्र के लिए ₹25,938 करोड़ की पीएलआई योजना को सराहा | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: ओला के सीईओ भाविश अग्रवाल ने केंद्र सरकार की ऑटो क्षेत्र के लिए ₹25,938 करोड़ की पीएलआई योजना की प्रशंसा करते हुए कहा है, "इस दूरदर्शी कदम से भारत इलैक्ट्रिक वाहनों का ग्लोबल हब बनेगा!" वहीं, महिंद्रा ग्रुप के चेयरमैन आनंद महिंद्रा ने कहा कि यह दिखाता है कि भारत भविष्य के ऑटोमोबाइल क्षेत्र में बड़ी ताकत बनना चाहता है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: $5.2 करोड़ जुटाकर इस साल भारत का 29वां यूनिकॉर्न स्टार्टअप बना लीशियस | Startup News | Inshorts
news_articles: बेंगलुरु स्थित मीट डिलीवरी स्टार्टअप लीशियस आईआईएफएल के लेट स्टेज टेक फंड और एवेंडस की अगुआई वाले फंडिंग राउंड में $5.2 करोड़ जुटाकर $1.05 अरब के मूल्यांकन के साथ 2021 में भारत का 29वां यूनिकॉर्न स्टार्टअप बन गया है। विवेक गुप्ता और अभय हंजूरा द्वारा 2015 में स्थापित लीशियस ने इसी साल टेमासेक के नेतृत्व में $19.2 करोड़ जुटाए थे।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: आईपीओ से पहले नायका ने निवशकों से जुटाए ₹2,396 करोड़ | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: नायका के संचालक एफएसएन ई-कॉमर्स वेंचर्स ने आईपीओ से पहले अपने निवेशकों से ₹2,396 करोड़ जुटा लिए हैं। कंपनी को टी रो प्राइस, जे.पी. मॉर्गन, गोल्डमैन सैक्स, एसबीआई म्यूचुअल फंड, ऐक्सिस म्यूचुअल फंड, सिंगापुर सरकार, आईसीआईसीआई प्रूडेंशियल समेत अन्य निवेशकों से फंडिंग मिली। नायका का आईपीओ के ज़रिए ₹5,350 करोड़ (करीब $71.4 करोड़) जुटाने का लक्ष्य है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: हम हर समय सभी को संतुष्ट नहीं कर सकते पर हमारी अंतरात्मा साफ है: अर्बन कंपनी | Startup News | Inshorts
news_articles: अर्बन कंपनी ने वर्कर्स के विरोध के बाद अपने भागीदारों की कमाई में सुधार के लिए 12 सूत्री कार्यक्रम पेश किया है। वहीं, कंपनी ने गुरुवार को विभिन्न श्रेणियों में कमीशन सीमा 30% से घटाकर 25% कर दी। कंपनी के को-फाउंडर अभिराज सिंह बहल ने कहा, "हम हर समय सभी को संतुष्ट नहीं कर सकते पर हमारी अंतरात्मा साफ है।"
author: shashank mishrashashank mishra

title: हुरुन के अनुसार महिलाओं के नेतृत्व वाले कौन से भारतीय स्टार्टअप्स हैं 'फ्यूचर यूनिकॉर्न'? | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: हुरुन इंडिया की पहली 'हुरुन इंडिया फ्यूचर यूनिकॉर्न लिस्ट' के अनुसार, महिलाओं की अगुवाई वाले 12 स्टार्टअप 'फ्यूचर यूनिकॉर्न' या $1 अरब+ मूल्यांकन वाले स्टार्टअप बनने जा रहे हैं। ये स्टार्टअप हैं- ज़िलिंगो, मामाअर्थ, मोबिक्विक, ईकॉम एक्सप्रेस, एको जनरल इंश्योरेंस, विनज़ो, मायग्लैम, स्क्वायर यार्ड्स, बैंकबाज़ार.कॉम, प्रतिलिपी, सिरियनलैब्स और ज़िवामे। अगले 2 साल में 5 स्टार्टअप्स यूनिकॉर्न बन सकते हैं।
author: Gunjan GoswamiGunjan Goswami

title: हेल्थीफाईमी के सीईओ की होल्डिंग कंपनी के पुतिन के पूर्व अधिकारी से संबंध: पैंडोरा पेपर्स | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: पैंडोरा पेपर्स के अनुसार, हेल्थीफाईमी के सीईओ तुषार वशिष्ठ की सिंगापुर स्थित होल्डिंग कंपनी रूस के राष्ट्रपति व्लादिमीर पुतिन के पूर्व अधिकारी किरील एंद्रोसोव के लैंग कैपिटल फंड से संबंधित है। फंड ने 2018 में हेल्थीफाईमी को शेयर सब्स्क्रिप्शन के लिए भुगतान किया था। हेल्थीफाईमी के बोर्ड को 3 वर्षों तक होल्डिंग कंपनी की शेयरधारिता की जानकारी नहीं मिली थी।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: बायजू ने ताज़ा फंडिंग राउंड में जुटाए ₹2,200 करोड़, $18 अरब हुआ मूल्यांकन  | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: बायजू ने न्यूयॉर्क की ऑक्सशॉट कैपिटल पार्टनर्स की अगुआई वाले फंडिंग राउंड में ₹2,200 करोड़ जुटाए हैं। नियामक को दी जानकारी के अनुसार, ऑक्सशॉट ने ₹2,85,072/शेयर पर बायजू में ₹1,200 करोड़, एडलवाइज़ ने ₹344.9 करोड़, आईआईएफएल ने ₹110 करोड़ व एक्सएन एक्सपोनेंट होल्डिंग ने ₹150 करोड़ का निवेश किया। बतौर रिपोर्ट्स, बायजू का मूल्यांकन अब $18 अरब हो गया है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: ग्रो ने जुटाए $25.1 करोड़, 6 महीने में 3 गुना बढ़कर $3 अरब हुआ मूल्यांकन | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: यूनिकॉर्न बनने के 6 महीने बाद स्टॉक व म्यूचुअल फंड इन्वेस्टमेंट ऐप ग्रो सीरीज़ ई फंडिंग राउंड में $25.1 करोड़ जुटाकर $3 अरब के मूल्यांकन वाली कंपनी बन गई है। आइकॉनिक ग्रोथ के नेतृत्व वाले इस राउंड में एलकियॉन, लोन पाइन कैपिटल व स्टेडफास्ट शामिल हुए। ग्रो की स्थापना फ्लिपकार्ट के 4 पूर्व अधिकारियों ने 2016 में की थी।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: शाओमी ने अपनी इलेक्ट्रिक वाहन कंपनी का आधिकारिक रूप से करवाया रजिस्ट्रेशन | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: चीन की स्मार्टफोन निर्माता शाओमी के सीईओ लेई जून के मुताबिक, कंपनी ने शाओमी ईवी के नाम से आधिकारिक रूप से इलेक्ट्रिक वाहन कंपनी का रजिस्ट्रेशन करवा लिया है। 300 कर्मचारियों वाली शाओमी ईवी की अगुआई लेई करेंगे। कंपनी ने मार्च में कहा था कि वह करीब $10 अरब के निवेश के साथ इलेक्ट्रिक कारों के निर्माण में कदम रखेगी।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: क्रेड और पेटीएम के सीईओ ने ऑनलाइन कोडिंग प्लैटफॉर्म में किया निवेश | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: क्रेड के सीईओ कुनाल शाह, पेटीएम के सीईओ विजय शेखर शर्मा और पाइन लैब्स के सीईओ अमरीश राउ ने ऑनलाइन कोडिंग प्लैटफॉर्म मसाई स्कूल में निवेश किया है। इसे शेयरचैट के सह-संस्थापक फरीद अहसान व लिवस्पेस के संस्थापक रमाकांत शर्मा समेत कुल 21 निवेशकों से फंडिंग मिली है। $80 लाख जुटाने के बाद इसका मूल्यांकन $3 करोड़ हो गया है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: भारत में पूर्ण स्वामित्व वाले रिटेल शोरूम ​खोलने की तैयारी में टेस्ला: खबर | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: खबरों के अनुसार, एलन मस्क की अगुआई वाली टेस्ला भारत में  पूर्ण स्वामित्व वाले रिटेल शोरूम खोलने के लिए सरकार के साथ बातचीत कर रही है। बकौल बिज़नेस स्टैंडर्ड, इसके लिए टेस्ला को सिंगल ब्रांड रिटेल संबंधी भारत के एफडीआई नियमों का पालन करना होगा। दुनिया की सबसे बड़ी फर्नीचर निर्माता आइकिया भी इसी तरह भारत में आई थी।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: डिजिटल इंश्योरेंस कंपनी एको $25.5 करोड़ जुटाकर इस साल भारत की 34वीं यूनिकॉर्न बनी | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: डिजिटल इंश्योरेंस कंपनी एको ने बताया कि उसने जनरल एटलांटिक और मल्टीपल्स प्राइवेट इक्विटी के नेतृत्व वाले सीरीज़ डी फंडिंग राउंड में $25.5 करोड़ जुटाए हैं। इसी के साथ कंपनी $1.1 अरब के मूल्यांकन के साथ इस साल भारत की 34वीं यूनिकॉर्न स्टार्टअप बन गई है। इस राउंड में कनाडा पेंशन प्लान इन्वेस्टमेंट बोर्ड और लाइटस्पीड भी शामिल हुए थे।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: उत्पाद के मूल देश से संबंधित गलत जानकारी देने को लेकर ई-कॉमर्स कंपनियों को भेजे गए 202 नोटिस | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: केंद्र ने पिछले एक साल में किसी उत्पाद के मूल देश से संबंधित गलत जानकारी देने के लिए ई-कॉमर्स प्लैटफॉर्म्स को 202 नोटिस जारी किए हैं। इनमें से सर्वाधिक नोटिस इलैक्ट्रॉनिक उत्पादों व परिधान को लेकर जारी किए गए हैं। इसके अलावा एक्सपायरी डेट और एमआरपी से अधिक कीमत वसूलने समेत अन्य उल्लंघनों को लेकर 15 नोटिस जारी हुए हैं।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: $26 करोड़ जुटाने के बाद कॉइन स्विच कुबेर बना भारत का दूसरा क्रिप्टो यूनिकॉर्न | Startup News | Inshorts
news_articles: कॉइनबेस वेंचर्स और एंड्रीसिन हॉरोविट्ज़ (a16z) की अगुआई वाले फंडिंग राउंड में $26 करोड़ जुटाकर कॉइन बेस कुबेर भारत का दूसरा क्रिप्टोकरेंसी यूनिकॉर्न बन गया है। इसका मूल्यांकन 6 महीने में चौगुना बढ़कर $1.9 अरब हो गया है। आशीष सिंघल, गोविंद सोनी और विमल सागर तिवारी द्वारा 2017 में स्थापित यह कंपनी 2021 में भारत की 30वीं यूनिकॉर्न है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: टेस्ला ने भारत आने से पहले पीएमओ से इलेक्ट्रिक वाहनों पर शुल्क घटाने का आग्रह किया: खबर | Automobile News | Inshorts
news_articles: बकौल रॉयटर्स, टेस्ला ने भारत में प्रवेश से पहले प्रधानमंत्री कार्यालय से इलेक्ट्रिक वाहनों पर आयात शुल्क घटाने की अपील की है। भारत में टेस्ला के पॉलिसी हेड मनुज खुराना व अन्य अधिकारी इस सिलसिले में पिछले महीने पीएमओ गए थे। इसके अलावा टेस्ला ने प्रधानमंत्री व एलन मस्क के बीच बैठक का आग्रह किया है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: फेसबुक ने पूर्व आईएएस अधिकारी राजीव अग्रवाल को पब्लिक पॉलिसी डायरेक्टर नियुक्त किया | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: फेसबुक इंडिया ने सोमवार को बताया कि उन्होंने पूर्व आईएएस अधिकारी राजीव अग्रवाल को पब्लिक पॉलिसी डायरेक्टर नियुक्त किया है। वह अंखी दास की जगह लेंगे जिन्होंने विवाद के बाद पिछले साल अक्टूबर में अपने पद से इस्तीफा दिया था। अग्रवाल इससे पहले उबर इंडिया और साउथ एशिया के पब्लिक पॉलिसी हेड रह चुके हैं।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: स्पेसX ने शेयर किया पहले ऑल-सिविलियन क्रू वाले अंतरिक्ष यान से पृथ्वी के व्यू का वीडियो | Startup News | Inshorts
news_articles: स्पेसX ने गुरुवार को पहले ऑल-सिविलियन क्रू के साथ लॉन्च हुए ड्रैगन अंतरिक्ष यान से पृथ्वी का व्यू दिखाता एक वीडियो शेयर किया है। 3-घंटे के भीतर यान 585 किमी से अधिक की ऑर्बिटल ऊंचाई पर पहुंच गया। स्पेसX के अनुसार, नासा के अपोलो मून प्रोग्राम (1972) के बाद यह किसी इंसान द्वारा पृथ्वी से सबसे दूर की उड़ान है।
author: नूतन कुमार गुप्तानूतन कुमार गुप्ता

title: ज़ोमैटो के बहुत अच्छे और बहुत बुरे दिन गौरव और मैंने साथ में देखे हैं: सीईओ गोयल | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: ज़ोमैटो के सह-संस्थापक गौरव गुप्ता द्वारा कंपनी छोड़ने के ऐलान के बाद सीईओ दीपिंदर गोयल ने कहा, "धन्यवाद गौरव गुप्ता, पिछले 6 साल शानदार रहे हैं। हमने साथ में ज़ोमैटो के बहुत अच्छे और बहुत बुरे दिन देखे हैं।" उन्होंने आगे कहा, "मैं इस बात का आभारी हूं कि हमारे पास आगे बढ़ने के लिए बेहतरीन टीम और लीडरशिप है।"
author: shashank mishrashashank mishra

title: फूड डिलीवरी ऐप्स को रेस्टोरेंट मानकर 5% टैक्स लगा सकती है जीएसटी परिषद: खबर | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: एक अधिकारी के अनुसार, जीएसटी परिषद शुक्रवार को होने वाली बैठक में ज़ोमैटो और स्विगी जैसे फूड डिलीवरी ऐप्स को रेस्टोरेंट मानकर इन पर 5% जीएसटी लगाने के प्रस्ताव पर चर्चा कर सकती है। अगर प्रस्ताव पारित होता है तो रेस्टोरेंट की जगह ये ऐप्स सरकार को जीएसटी देंगी। खबर के अनुसार, ग्राहकों पर अतिरिक्त बोझ नहीं पड़ेगा।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: ओयो अगले हफ्ते ₹8,000 करोड़ तक के आईपीओ के लिए कर सकता है आवेदन: रिपोर्ट | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: पीटीआई के अनुसार, हॉस्पिटैलिटी स्टार्टअप ओयो $1.2 अरब (लगभग ₹8,000 करोड़) तक के आईपीओ के लिए संबंधित कागज़ात (डीआरएचपी) अगले सप्ताह सेबी के पास जमा कर सकता है। ओयो ने आईपीओ प्रबंधन के लिए जे.पी. मॉर्गन, सिटी व कोटक महिंद्रा कैपिटल को नियुक्त किया है। गौरतलब है कि माइक्रोसॉफ्ट ने पिछले महीने ओयो में $50 लाख का निवेश किया था।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: फिनो पेमेंट्स बैंक शुक्रवार को लाएगा ₹1,200 करोड़ का आईपीओ, ₹560-₹577 होगा प्राइस बैंड | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: फिनो पेमेंट्स बैंक 29 अक्टूबर को ₹1,200 करोड़ का आईपीओ लाने जा रहा है जिसमें ₹300 करोड़ के नए शेयर (फ्रेश इश्यू) जारी होंगे। इसके अलावा कंपनी के मौजूदा निवेशक 1.5 करोड़ शेयरों की पेशकश (ओएफएस) करेंगे। कंपनी ने ₹560-₹577/शेयर का प्राइस बैंड तय किया है और आईपीओ के लिए कम-से-कम ₹14,000 का निवेश करना होगा।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: कुनाल शाह की क्रेड ने जुटाए $25.1 करोड़, 6 महीने में मूल्यांकन दोगुना बढ़कर $4 अरब हुआ | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: कुनाल शाह के नेतृत्व वाली क्रेडिट कार्ड पेमेंट कंपनी क्रेड ने टाइगर ग्लोबल और फाल्कन ऐज की अगुआई वाले सीरीज़ ई फंडिंग राउंड में $25.1 करोड़ जुटा लिए हैं। कंपनी का ताज़ा मूल्यांकन अप्रैल 2021 के $2.2 अरब से लगभग दोगुना बढ़कर $4.1 अरब हो गया है। इस राउंड में मार्शल वेस और स्टेडफास्ट वेंचर कैपिटल ने भी हिस्सा लिया।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: फेसबुक, वॉट्सऐप व इंस्टाग्राम के आउटेज के बाद मार्क ज़करबर्ग की संपत्ति $6 अरब घटी | Startup News | Inshorts
news_articles: बकौल ब्लूमबर्ग, व्हिसलब्लोअर के सामने आने व फेसबुक, वॉट्सऐप व इंस्टाग्राम के ग्लोबल आउटेज के बाद कंपनी के सीईओ मार्क ज़करबर्ग की संपत्ति में $6 अरब की गिरावट आई है। ज़करबर्ग की संपत्ति पिछले कुछ हफ्तों में $140 अरब से गिरकर $122 अरब पर पहुंच गई है। वहीं, फेसबुक के शेयरों में सोमवार को 4.9% की गिरावट दर्ज हुई।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: Walked out when director abused; didn't resume until apology: Esha | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Actress Esha Gupta has revealed that she walked out of a set after a director abused her over a miscommunication and didn't resume shooting until he apologised. Esha said he said something in Hindi but she remained calm. "But the second time he [abused]...I said 'Don't ever talk to me like that or disrespect me'," she added.
author: Kriti KambiriKriti Kambiri

title: It was my life: Shivangi on quitting Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: Taking to Instagram, actress Shivangi Joshi shared a note on quitting her show 'Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai'. She wrote, "It wasn't just a show, it was my life...I've cried here, laughed here...had food with everyone, gave silly expressions when I was supposed to give a serious look...the list could be endless...Thank you Rajan sir for giving me this opportunity."
author: Mahima KharbandaMahima Kharbanda

title: Character changes were disappointing: Erica on 'Kuch Rang…' going off air | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: A few days before her show 'Kuch Rang Pyar Ke Aise Bhi' goes off air, actress Erica Fernandes penned her thoughts about its end. Erica said she was disappointed over the changes her character Sonakshi underwent. Taking to Instagram, she wrote, "I hope you'll...remember Sonakshi from the first two seasons and not how weak...she was made to look this season."
author: Mahima KharbandaMahima Kharbanda

title: India's gold demand rises 47% to 139 tonnes in September quarter: WGC | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: India's gold demand increased by 47% year-on-year to 139.1 tonnes in the July-September quarter, the World Gold Council (WGC) said in a report. Gold demand in the country is bouncing back to pre-COVID-19 levels and the outlook looks bullish going forward, it added. In terms of value, India's gold demand went up by 37% to ₹59,330 crore in the quarter.
author: Krishna RajKrishna Raj

title: आरोपी की पत्नी से जबरन वसूली के आरोप में रेप पीड़िता व 4 अन्य मुंबई में गिरफ्तार | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: मुंबई (महाराष्ट्र) में 19-वर्षीय कथित रेप पीड़िता और उसकी मां समेत 5 लोग रेप के आरोपी की पत्नी से जबरन वसूली के मामले में गिरफ्तार हुए हैं। बकौल पुलिस, शख्स की पत्नी से एक महिला ने केस वापस लेने के लिए ₹14 लाख मांगे थे। इसके बाद शख्स की पत्नी की शिकायत पर पुलिस ने जाल बिछाकर उन्हें पकड़ लिया।
author: अनिल कुमारअनिल कुमार

title: अर्जुन पुरस्कार के लिए पैरालंपिक्स सिल्वर मेडलिस्ट नोएडा के डीएम सुहास के नाम की सिफारिश | Sports News | Inshorts
news_articles: राष्ट्रीय खेल पुरस्कारों की चयन समिति ने अर्जुन पुरस्कार के लिए गौतमबुद्ध नगर (यूपी) के ज़िलाधिकारी व बैडमिंटन खिलाड़ी सुहास एल.वाई. के नाम की सिफारिश की है। सुहास ने कहा, "मुझे इतना प्यार व स्नेह देने के लिए देशवासियों का शुक्रिया अदा करता हूं।" गौरतलब है, सुहास ने टोक्यो पैरालंपिक्स में पुरुषों की एसएल4 श्रेणी में रजत पदक जीता था।
author: shashank mishrashashank mishra

title: सरकार ने देशभर में 30 नवंबर तक कोविड-19 प्रतिबंधों को बढ़ाया | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: केंद्र सरकार ने देशभर में कोविड-19 प्रतिबंधों को 30 नवंबर तक बढ़ा दिया है। इससे पहले के आदेश में सरकार ने कहा था कि कंटेनमेंट ज़ोन में सामूहिक सभा पर रोक जारी रहनी चाहिए। सरकार ने कहा था कि कोविड-19 के मामले बढ़ने की संभावना से बचने के लिए 5-सूत्री रणनीति (टेस्ट-ट्रैक-ट्रीट-वैक्सीनेशन और कोविड उपयुक्त व्यवहार) का पालन होना चाहिए।
author: रौनक राज रौनक राज

title: निंदनीय कार्रवाई: आगरा में कश्मीरी छात्रों की गिरफ्तारी पर महबूबा मुफ्ती | Politics News | Inshorts
news_articles: क्रिकेट मैच में भारत पर पाकिस्तान की जीत का जश्न मनाने के आरोप में आगरा (उत्तर प्रदेश) में 3 कश्मीरी छात्रों की गिरफ्तारी को पीडीपी प्रमुख महबूबा मुफ्ती ने निंदनीय कार्रवाई बताया है। उन्होंने कहा, "2 साल के दमन के बाद कश्मीर की स्थिति देखकर केंद्र की आंख खुल जानी चाहिए थी।" उन्होंने छात्रों की रिहाई की मांग की है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: पहले नोटिस दिए बिना समीर वानखेड़े को गिरफ्तार नहीं करेंगे: हाईकोर्ट से महाराष्ट्र सरकार | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: महाराष्ट्र सरकार ने गुरुवार को बॉम्बे हाईकोर्ट को बताया कि वह एनसीबी के ज़ोनल डायरेक्टर समीर वानखेड़े को 3 दिन का नोटिस दिए बिना गिरफ्तार नहीं करेगी। मुंबई पुलिस ने मुंबई क्रूज़ ड्रग्स केस की जांच कर रहे वानखेड़े के खिलाफ उगाही के आरोपों को लेकर जांच शुरू की है। एनसीबी ने भी उनके खिलाफ जांच के आदेश दिए हैं।
author: नूतन कुमार गुप्तानूतन कुमार गुप्ता

title: एनटीए जारी कर सकेगा एनईईटी का परिणाम, बॉम्बे हाईकोर्ट के फैसले पर एससी ने लगाई रोक | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने नैशनल टेस्टिंग एजेंसी (एनटीए) को मेडिकल प्रवेश परीक्षा एनईईटी-यूजी 2021 का परिणाम जारी करने की इजाज़त दे दी। कोर्ट ने बॉम्बे हाईकोर्ट के आदेश पर रोक लगा दी जिसमें परिणाम पर रोक लगाकर एनटीए को दो छात्रों की परीक्षा दोबारा लेने को कहा गया था। छात्रों के अनुसार, उन्हें प्रश्न-पुस्तिकाएं और उत्तर-पुस्तिकाएं अलग-अलग सीरीज़ की मिली थीं।
author: अनिल कुमारअनिल कुमार

title: नोएडा में सोसायटी के सुरक्षाकर्मियों ने वहां रहने वाले 2 युवकों को लाठियों से पीटा | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: नोएडा सेक्टर-46 के आम्रपाली सफायर सोसायटी के सुरक्षाकर्मियों ने वहां रहने वाले 2 युवकों को लाठियों से पीटा जिसका एक वीडियो वायरल हुआ है। पुलिस के अनुसार, इससे पहले दोनों पीड़ितों और एक सुरक्षाकर्मी के बीच पार्किंग स्टिकर को लेकर झड़प हुई थी जिसके बाद यह घटना घटी। बतौर खबर, घटना के बाद 6 सुरक्षाकर्मियों को हिरासत में लिया गया।
author: Gunjan GoswamiGunjan Goswami

title: महिला ने सालभर में 7 लोगों के खिलाफ दर्ज कराए रेप केस, 2 फर्ज़ी निकले | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: हरियाणा महिला आयोग ने राज्य की पुलिस को फर्ज़ी रेप केस दर्ज कराने के आरोपों को लेकर एक महिला के खिलाफ जांच करने को कहा है। एक शिकायत के अनुसार, महिला ने गुरुग्राम के विभिन्न थानों में सालभर में 7 अलग-अलग लोगों के खिलाफ रेप केस दर्ज कराए। बकौल रिपोर्ट्स, 7 में से 2 मामले फर्ज़ी पाए गए।
author: वेद प्रकाश शर्मावेद प्रकाश शर्मा

title: क्रिप्टो लेनदेन में यूपीआई भुगतान पर रोक को लेकर एचसी ने आरबीआई व एसबीआई को भेजा नोटिस | Business News | Inshorts
news_articles: दिल्ली हाईकोर्ट ने क्रिप्टो एक्सचेंज में यूपीआई भुगतान को प्रतिबंधित करने के फैसले को वापस लेने की मांग वाली याचिका पर गुरुवार को आरबीआई, एसबीआई, एनपीसीआई व अन्य को नोटिस जारी किया। याचिका में आरोप लगाया गया है कि वज़ीरएक्स यूज़र्स के लिए यूपीआई सेवाओं को रोकने का एसबीआई का फैसला सुप्रीम कोर्ट के एक फैसले के खिलाफ है।
author: Gunjan GoswamiGunjan Goswami

title: कुछ देश हिंद-प्रशांत क्षेत्र में अधिक नियंत्रण हासिल करना चाहते हैं: नौसेना प्रमुख | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: नौसेना प्रमुख एडमिरल करमबीर सिंह ने बुधवार को कहा कि कुछ देश 'भू-केंद्रित क्षेत्रीय मानसिकता' अपनाकर हिंद-प्रशांत क्षेत्र में अधिक नियंत्रण हासिल करने के प्रयास में हैं। बकौल सिंह, समुद्री हिंद-प्रशांत के वैश्विक नियमों को चुनौती दी जा रही है। उन्होंने इस क्षेत्र को भू-राजनीति और अर्थव्यवस्था का केंद्र बताते हुए कहा कि यहां प्रतिस्पर्धा में विविधता आ रही है।
author: जय शंकर ठाकुरजय शंकर ठाकुर

title: पुरुष गार्ड ने महिला आरएएस कैंडिडेट के टॉप की स्लीव काटी; एनसीडब्ल्यू ने की आलोचना | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: राष्ट्रीय महिला आयोग (एनसीडब्ल्यू) ने उस घटना की आलोचना की है जिसमें राजस्थान लोक सेवा आयोग (आरएएस) के एक परीक्षा केंद्र के बाहर एक पुरुष गार्ड एक महिला के टॉप की स्लीव काट रहा है। एनसीडब्ल्यू की अध्यक्ष रेखा शर्मा ने इसे लेकर कहा, "नकल रोकने के नाम पर वह लड़कियों के कपड़े कैसे काट सकता है...यह घटिया हरकत है।"
author: शुभम गुप्ताशुभम गुप्ता

title: वसूली के मामले में मुंबई के पूर्व पुलिस कमिश्नर परम बीर के खिलाफ गैर-ज़मानती वॉरंट जारी | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: ठाणे (महाराष्ट्र) की एक अदालत ने ज़बरन वसूली के मामले में मुंबई के पूर्व पुलिस कमिश्नर परम बीर सिंह के खिलाफ गैर-ज़मानती वॉरंट जारी किया है। इससे पहले, पुलिस ने सिंह के घर के बाहर नोटिस चस्पा कर पूछताछ के लिए 9-अक्टूबर को बुलाया था लेकिन वह पेश नहीं हुए। बकौल रिपोर्ट्स, सिंह पर महाराष्ट्र में 5 एफआईआर दर्ज हैं।
author: shashank mishrashashank mishra

title: पटाखों पर बैन किसी समुदाय के खिलाफ नहीं: सुप्रीम कोर्ट | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: सुप्रीम कोर्ट ने देशभर में पटाखों के निर्माण-बिक्री पर प्रतिबंध की मांग वाली एक याचिका पर पटाखा निर्माताओं से कहा कि खुशियां मनाने की आड़ में उन्हें लोगों की जान से खिलवाड़ की अनुमति नहीं दी जा सकती है। हालांकि कोर्ट ने ग्रीन पटाखों की अनुमति देते हुए कहा कि पटाखों पर प्रतिबंध किसी समुदाय/समूह के खिलाफ नहीं है।
author: Gunjan GoswamiGunjan Goswami

title: बॉम्बे हाईकोर्ट ने मुंबई क्रूज़ ड्रग्स मामले में आर्यन खान को दी ज़मानत | Entertainment News | Inshorts
news_articles: बॉम्बे हाईकोर्ट ने मुंबई क्रूज़ ड्रग्स मामले में शाहरुख खान के बेटे आर्यन खान को ज़मानत दे दी है। इससे पहले मजिस्ट्रेट अदालत और एनडीपीएस की एक विशेष अदालत ने आर्यन की ज़मानत याचिका खारिज कर दी थी। नार्कोटिक्स कंट्रोल ब्यूरो (एनसीबी) ने आर्यन को 2 अक्टूबर को हिरासत में लिया था और बाद में उन्हें गिरफ्तार कर लिया।
author: रौनक राज रौनक राज

title: ड्रग्स का सेवन करने वालों को जेल नहीं सुधार गृह भेजना चाहिए: केंद्रीय मंत्री अठावले | Politics News | Inshorts
news_articles: केंद्रीय मंत्री रामदास अठावले ने कहा, "देश में शराब पीने वालों को जेल नहीं भेजा जाता लेकिन कानून में ड्रग्स का सेवन करने वालों को जेल भेजने का एक प्रावधान है।" उन्होंने कहा, "हमारे मंत्रालय को लगता है कि ड्रग्स का सेवन करने वालों को जेल नहीं बल्कि सुधार गृह भेजा जाना चाहिए...कानून को बदलने की ज़रूरत है।"
author: अनिल कुमारअनिल कुमार

title: Vendor caught on camera washing vegetables in drain water in MP; charged | National News | Inshorts
news_articles: A vegetable vendor in Madhya Pradesh's Bhopal has been charged after he was caught on video washing coriander leaves with drain water, an official said. The man recording the video could be heard telling the vendor that washing vegetables in drain water is harmful. "I have directed officials concerned to take action," DM Avinash Lavania said.
author: Arshiya ChopraArshiya Chopra

title: B Praak expresses gratitude as he wins his 1st National Film Award
content: ANI | Updated: Oct 25, 2021 17:12  ISTNew Delhi [India], October 25 (ANI): Singer B Praak is extremely happy as on Monday he won his first National Award for his song 'Teri Mitti' from Akshay Kumar-starrer 'Kesari'."It has been a year full of things to be grateful for. But of all the highlights, this award shines brightest. I am so overwhelmed. It's a surreal moment for me and I feel so blessed that we as a team created a song that resonated with a nation in such a strong way. Today will always remain a precious day in my career. Every artist wants to be valued and there cannot be a greater honour than the National Award," B Praak shared.Vice President Venkaiah Naidu presented the Best Playback Singer Male Award to B Praak at the 67th National Film Awards ceremony, which was held at Vigyan Bhavan in Delhi.After receiving the award, B Praak took to Instagram to share a glimpse of the special moment with his fans. He uploaded a video of him walking up to the stage to receive the award."Thank you to the respected national awards as I post this I am filled with tears and gratitude .. will continue working harder to keep winning your love congrats to team Terimitti And My Family Friends My Fans," he wrote. Apart from B Praak, producer Sajid Nadiadwala, director Nitesh Tiwari, actor Manoj Bajpayee, Dhanush, and Kangana Ranaut among others also attended the 67th National Film Awards ceremony.
